snippet.title: Half-Life: Alyx Gameplay Video 2
snippet.description:
Return to City 17 on March 23, 2020.

Set between the events of Half-Life and Half-Life 2, Half-Life: Alyx is a new full-length game built from the ground up by Valve for virtual reality.

This video demonstrates the Continuous locomotion style.

Pre-purchase on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/546560/HalfLife_Alyx/
Read more: https://steamcommunity.com/games/546560/announcements/detail/1710743290795360946

#HalfLifeAlyx
#HalfLife
